entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return something. And I need to do it NOW. This has already been a huge pain.
I understand your frustration, sir/madam. I'll do my best to assist you. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's order #VF12345. Look, I don't have all day. Just tell me I can return it. It's a VeloBand Pulse.
Thank you. Let me pull up that order... Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. What seems to be the issue?
The issue is it's junk! Doesn't track my heart rate properly. I want my money back. How do I return this thing?
I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with your VeloBand Pulse. Our standard return policy is 90 days for a full refund. Let me guide you through the return process.
90 days? Finally, something easy. So, I just send it back?

Yes, sir/madam. To initiate the return, I'll email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse securely, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. Once we receive the item, we'll process your refund.
Fine. Just send the label. And make sure the refund goes back to the same card. This whole experience has been ridiculous. I expect to see the money back in my account ASAP.

Absolutely. I've just sent the email with the prepaid label. Please allow a few business days for the refund to reflect in your account once we receive the VeloBand Pulse. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
Yeah, there is! How come this stupid smart watch doesn’t just work? You guys sell garbage! What if I want to complain to a manager?

I understand your frustration, sir/madam. I can certainly document your feedback regarding the performance of the VeloBand Pulse. While I cannot directly connect you to a manager at this moment, I can assure you that your comments will be forwarded to our product development team. We are always striving to improve our products.
Product development? It's already developed! It's broken! Nevermind. Just forget it. I'm done with this.

Sir/Madam, I understand your frustration, but I do want to ensure you are taken care of. While the standard return policy is 90 days, there can be exceptions made to the return policy for our products. I can check further with a manager to see what other options we have...
Forget it! I don’t have time for this. I’m calling someone else. Goodbye.
